name: Dhaka to Cox's Bazar
description: Cox's Bazar beach is the longest sea beaches in the world. Itâ€™s a sandy beach with an unbroken 155 Km length. The sea beach is the main attraction of the Cox's Bazar town.

name: Dhaka to Sajek Valley
description: Sajek is one of the few place in bangladesh ,which is really natural wonder and natural paradise.Sajek valley is known for its natural environment and is surrounded by mountains.

name: Dhaka to Tanguar Haor
description: Tanguar Haor is a river basin which is located at the Tahirpur Upazila of Sunamgonj district in Sylhet Division. Its takes roughly 6-7 hours to reach here from Dhaka.
